In a city with more than its share of beautiful, historic landmarks, there is one building that is about to begin its new Landmark life on the center of Market Street -- The Wilson. Built in 1904, then a survivor of the 1906 earthquake, The Wilson has been completely re-imagined and re-established for the 21st century resident seeking a home with a story to share for generations to come. Having seen the city grow-up and transform around it, The Wilson is now set to become the premiere address for residents looking to do more than just rent an apartment; The Wilson is for those looking to live the Landmark Life.

The Duboce Triangle is a vibrant and highly-desirable neighborhood infused with color and culture. Duboce is a boutique-style apartment community that blends high style with urban luxury. While our location is distinctly tranquil, the bustling nightlife and remarkable shopping selection of the Castro and the Mission are mere steps away.Embracing an urban retro aesthetic, Duboce provides stellar community features, remarkable amenities and pet-friendly living options. From our polished porcelain tile flooring and dual-tone cabinets to our beautiful subway tile backsplashes and Caesarstone quartz countertops, Duboce offers classic living and will quickly become your happy place. Perfect for entertaining friends and family, each apartment home provides staple items for a fun, yet functional space that will enhance your living experience.With one- and two-bedroom apartment rentals and a variety of floor plans, Duboce is ideal for those seeking a walkable home life and an effortless commute. Whether enjoying a BBQ with friends and family or soaking up the sun on our expansive roof deck, residents at Duboce enjoy exciting features that allow them to feel connected and comfortable. This beautifully remodeled 2 bedroom flat, on one of the most picturesque and serene streets in Eureka Valley combines a terrific array of features that make it the ideal furnished property for those who want the best of what San Francisco has to offer. text:

Available Now! This ground floor unit has been newly built! Be the first to use all amenities! The modern kitchen offers Shaker style cabinets, gas stove, stainless steel appliances (with dishwasher) and a large breakfast bar. The living-rooms functional layout will accommodate a comfortable place to relax and opens up to a small outdoor space.  Both bedrooms are a good size. The larger room is spacious enough for a queen sized bed, side table and dresser and the smaller of the two would best fit a full size bed and dresser.  The bathroom features tasteful tile work, a step in shower with glass door and modern fixtures. THE NEIGHBORHOOD:Mid-Market/SOMA
Over the past few years, a slew of developments along San Francisco's grandest thoroughfare has led to the recent minting of a shiny new Mid-Market/SOMA neighborhood. The seven-block stretch of Market Street, between Van Ness and 5th Street, is relishing renewed vitality, with the openings of killer markets, restaurants, bars, culture and more..
644c Natoma is situated on a tree line street, and located within walking distance to countless amenities.Walk Score of 95 out of 100! 5 minute walk from the J Church, KT INGLESIDE/THIRD and the L TARAVAL at the Metro Civic Center Station stop

		2 hall closets in addition to the bedroom closet

title: $2280 Charming One Bedroom Apartment with Ample Storage Available 12/1
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
If you are looking to get away from having to walk around human feces, but still want to stay in the city, this is the place for you.
·      one bedroom/one-bathroom  in-law apartment with full kitchenette (Stove, Fridge, Microwave)
·      beautiful views of the sunset from the backyard which has furniture and great to let your pet run
·      If you like the beach, it is only a mile away.
·      If you like nature, Stern Grove is just a few blocks away and is home to the largest dog park in the city.
·      This apartment is perfect if you have a pet. There is no additional deposit or monthly fee. There is also a pet door installed for the backyard.
·       If you are an outdoor enthusiast and have snowboards, bikes, camping gear, etc., you can comfortably fit everything in the ample storage space available. There is shelving, a place to store your shoes, and hangers for jackets.
·      The inside of the apartment is cozy. Since you have so much storage, you do not have to cram everything into the apartment. All furniture EXCEPT the black dresser, TV, and bed are available and can be included for a negotiable price.  There is a blackout curtain secured with Velcro in the bedroom to help you with a good night's rest.
·      Another plus is there are a washer and dryer. No more having to spend hours at the laundromat.
·      Plenty of safe street parking. 
•	This neighborhood is very clean and safe. Everyone is very friendly.
·      If you need to shop, Lakeshore Plaza is in walking distance. There are several stores such as a Lucky, GNC, Ross, and Petco, Peet's, to name a few. If you want Trader Joe's and more shopping, Stonestown is very close. 
Rent: $2,280/mo. Security Deposit: 1 month's rent

title: $4750 / 1br - Charming, renovated apartment in classic Tudor Revival building
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Mazal55Properties

Features:

Well-maintained apartment and building with charming period details throughout

Large living room with an exposed-beam ceiling and views of Presidio Park

Formal dining room with southern exposure (can also be set up as an office)

Brand new kitchen with western exposure, featuring:
Granite counter tops

Gas range and oven

Dishwasher

Large refrigerator with an ice maker

In-sink disposal


Large bedroom with good space

Bathroom with a shower-over-tub, pedestal sink, and large built-in cabinet

High ceilings throughout

Sanded and refinished hardwood flooring throughout

title: $2000 Charming studio
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Small, but special studio with lots of natural light. Cherry hardwood floors throughout. Kitchen is separated from main room and has an old Wedgewood gas stove and Japanese mizuya cabinets. A fold down double bed with built in closets and drawers allows for efficient and attractive use of space. Double paned new windows. Large tiled shower, fold down ironing board. This is a five unit older apartment building with a large communal roof deck. The apartment is on the top floor in the back and faces onto Varennes. The unit is approximately 350'-375' square feet.
No parking, no pets, this is a no smoking building.
Rent is $2,000 per month (includes water and garbage), 1 year lease, $1,000 security deposit.
Varennes is a a two block street that runs from Filbert to Union to Green. 100 Varennes is on the corner of Varennes and Union. The location provides for easy access to North Beach restaurants, downtown and public transportation.
Ready for occupancy November 1st.

title: $4095 / 1br - 850ft2 - Charming, Sunny, Spacious-TOP Floor W/ views-1 Block from the SF Yacht
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Come see and judge for yourself what $4,095.00 per month is really worth. Now, are you the correct custodian to reside in this urban sanctuary and live 1 block from the SF Yacht Harbor/Bay? 
This spacious 1 bedroom apartment approximates over 850 square feet. The unit has hardwood floors and seven (7) large floor-to-ceiling (72" High) bay windows making the unit bright and sunny. The unit is painted in three tones making your future home feel warm and charming. It is on the TOP FLOOR in the front of the building and has views of the San Francisco Bay and SF Yacht Harbor from the bay windows. All interior windows have been replaced by dual pane operating windows. 
The building is a beautiful Spanish/Mediterranean style built in 1929 and has almost all of the period's charming accents with many modern upgrades. The living room (13' X 20') and dining rooms (9.5' X 9.5') have coffered ceilings with arched entry ways. The bedroom (17' X 10') and hallway has vaulted barreled ceilings. 
This intimate 6 unit building is ideal for the discerning tenant wishing a quiet living environment by avoiding the inconveniences of co habitation hassles in the larger buildings in the Marina and unresponsive owners. 
The unit has been completely remodeled with new custom cherry wood cabinets and gorgeous granite counters in the kitchen, new decorative tiles in the bathroom, and reconfigured/reorganized walk in closets to maximize closet space.  All windows in the unit have been replaced and are dual panes operating windows. All work was done with a permit and ensures you that the remodel was done to code. 
Kitchen (13.5' X 7') appliances include new electric stove, new refrigerator, new dishwasher,  under counter lights, a deep stainless steel sink (18" W X 30" L X 10"), Groen kitchen faucet, and new garbage disposal. 
The ELECTRICAL AND COPPER PLUMBING HAS BEEN COMPLETELY REPLACED with additional electrical /cable/phone plugs strategically placed throughout the unit. 
Units are cable ready and have CAT 5 phone lines. 
The unit has had significant seismic upgrades (Shear Wall and Hold Down Pins).  All work was completed with a building permit.
You are only blocks away from the Chestnut Street shopping and restaurants, the Marina Greens, Crissy Fields, Palace of Fine Arts, and the Presidio. 
Public transportation is at your doorstep. This is the first 30X bus stop which ensures you a seat on the bus. 
Coin operated laundry facilities are located in the building. 
1 stacked parking space available for an additional $ 200.00. 
Storage closet in garage available for $ 200.00
Landlord pays water, garbage, and common area PG&E. 
NO PETS PLEASE. 
Current pictures provided are for representation purposes of what the unit could look like. 
The unit will be vacant on October 13 , 2018. 
To view the unit, please call my cell @  show contact info
.

text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Newly Remodeled with Designer Finishes/Upgrades
For information and to schedule a viewing, contact: Tony at  show contact info
. 
Property Description
Newly renovated 2 Bedroom 1 Bath in the historical district of Alamo Square. A majestic Edwardian Building which has the distinction of being designated a Historical site. The spacious bedrooms have large windows and lots of natural light. The gourmet kitchen has been remodeled with attention to detail. It features quartz counter tops, Italian Porcelain back splash, Samsung stainless steel appliances (french door refrigerator, dishwasher, convection oven, hood and microwave) Italian Porcelain tiles, a walk up kitchen-island which accommodates seating, Large stainless steel sink, Grohe faucet and self-closing drawers. The bathroom features a glass enclosed soaking tub, Italian porcelain tiles, quartz counter top and Hans Grohe Fixtures. The living area is bright and airy with an accompanying dining area. Specially chosen modern lighting fixtures throughout. The apartment boasts hardwood floors throughout. Laundry is conveniently located within the building along with a shared patio space. On street parking. The easiest neighborhood in SF to park. Hard to believe but is truly a pleasant surprise.  
The location is within walking distance of the shops and restaurants of Hayes Valley, Nopa and Fillmore. Easy access to public transportation services by Muni bus lines including the 5, 21, 22, and 24. It has great freeway access to both 101 and 280. Google, Facebook, EA and Apple have shuttle pick ups within walking distance.  
Interior Design Features: 
- 10ft. ceilings 
- Solid Hardwood doors with stainless steel hardware 
- Hardwood floors 
- Modern lighting fixtures throughout 
- Lots of Closet and storage space 
- Expansive windows with top-down bottom up single cell shades 
- Bedroom with distinctive wood molding 
- Washer and dryer in building 
- Shared Backyard 
- Gas, electricity and water separately metered

title: $3395 / 1br - Completely remodeled Laurel Hts/Presidio 1BR APT
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Beautiful large sunny 1BR/1BA unit available now. This is a large bright 2nd floor unit in a small courtyard building facing the courtyard. 
The unit has hardwood floors, remodeled tiled eat-in kitchen with new stainless steel range, refrigerator, microwave and dishwasher, updated tiled bathroom with new fixtures and decorative plaster moldings. This apartment has lots of closet/storage space.
There is a coin operated laundry on site, bike storage available and one parking space will become available in late October (for an additional $325 per month). 
The building is ideally located for muni to downtown, financial district and all areas, is a few short blocks from Laurel Village restaurants and shopping, and located close to both the Presidio and Golden Gate Park.

title: $2795 / 1br - 900ft2 - COMPLETELY REMODELED, NEW large one bedroom w/VIEWS, parking INCLUDED
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
OPEN HOUSE
1st showing: Saturday, 10/13 from 2:50PM to 3:15PM
2nd showing: Sunday, 10/14 from 1:35PM to 2:00PM
Upon arrival at 140 Gardenside Drive, please use the intercom and call apt 205 and I will buzz you in. Once inside the building, there are stairs on either side of the hallway. Proceed down TWO flights of stairs to Apt #205. If you are unable to make it to the showings noted above, please email me and we can schedule another day/time for showing.
NOTE: I am also showing another ONE bedroom apt at 110 Gardenside Drive (two buildings over from this unit) right before this showing. Please see the following listing for details: 
sfbay.craigslist.org/sfc/apa/d/beautiful-large-one-bedroom/6720457452.html
ABOUT THE UNIT
~ COMPLETELY REMODELED LARGE one bedroom, one bath apartment located in Twin Peaks
~ This corner one bedroom unit is a VERY LARGE one bedroom (approximately 900 sq feet)
~ Brand new kitchen w/quartz countertop, maple wood cabinets, new tiled kitchen flooring. Kitchen includes dishwasher, fridge, full sized (electric) stove, garbage disposal
~ Brand new synthetic "hardwood" floors
~ Nice open floor plan with large living room and separate dining room area 
~ Huge living room opens up to large private balcony with views of SF Bay (water views)
~ Dining room area is large enough to accommodate 6-8 person dining table
~ Brand new bathroom w/new bathtub, new tiled floors, new shower doors, new toilet, new sink
~ Large bedroom 
~ Lots of closet space...one hall closet by entrance, one closet located in bathroom area and one huge closet in bedroom
~ One indoor garage parking INCLUDED in the rent + One storage room space INCLUDED in the rent
ABOUT THE BUILDING 
~ 17 unit building located in Twin Peaks
~ Building has intercom entry system 
~ Laundry facilities in the building 
~ Resident Manager onsite 
~ Short walk to MUNI stops
~ Two large guest parking lots available for tenant's use 
LEASE TERMS 
~ One year lease required 
~ Rent $2,795 per month + one month security deposit 
~ Rent INCLUDES one garage parking space, one storage room space, water and garbage; Tenant is responsible for PG&E 
~ Pet policy: up to two neutered/spayed cats allowed in the unit; no pet fee required; sorry no dogs allowed

- One car side by side parking available for small car. If you have a large car, one car tandem parking with another tenant in the building.
- Non smoking unit
- Available Now!
Buena Vista/Ashbury Heights is a small community, and one of San Francisco's many neighborhoods built upon a steep hill providing breathtaking views of the city. It is close to all amenities in the Haight and to Golden Gate Park.
The neighborhood is light in commercial traffic, but heavy in green and residential space, with the entire area lined with large plantings of palm trees, lending it an attractive tropical character. The focus of the community circles around Buena Vista Park, the first official park in San Francisco established in 1867. The park is celebrated by its nearby residents and by all San Franciscans for its secluded, winding trails as well as for being home to one of the city's few remaining oak woodlands.
The homes that line the streets in this upscale neighborhood are a mix of the traditional Edwardian and Victorian single-family homes innate to San Francisco's character, with modern residences whose contemporary architects gracefully blended in their designs, a nod to the neighborhood's inherent style.
Its convenient location provides walking-distance proximity to a large handful of neighboring districts overflowing with boutiques, bars, restaurants, cafes, vintage clothing stores, home décor shops, and music venues. And with the city's public transit lines running through and around its borders, accessing other parts of the city is simple.
Buena Vista/Ashbury Heights is a notably beautiful neighborhood that embodies a very unique charm and offering an exclusive San Francisco experience.
Please contact Liz Pisco
Leasing Agent -- License # 01515257
Broker -- Jackie Tom / Rentals In SF 1318 Hayes Street San Francisco CA 94117.

title: $1850 / 1br - Cozy 1 Bedroom
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This is a cozy, 1 bedroom garden level unit, which is ideal for 1 person.  Unit is cozy and has good natural lights.  A semi-private yard is ideal for lounging, barbecue, and/or quiet times.  Living room and kitchen is a one room combination.  Kitchen has granite countertop, electric stove, and wood cabinets.  Bathroom has shower over tub.  Both living room and bedroom have double pane windows.
Located in the desirable Parkside area of 29th Ave. (x-Quintara).  A few steps to the 66 Quintara bus line; a quick ride can take you directly to the UCSF Parnassus Campus.  Also, a few steps to the 48 bus line; a short bus ride takes you to the Ocean Beach quickly.  Or it can take you directly to the 22nd St. Cal train station passing through the Noe Valley, and Inner Mission area.
A short walk to the nearby commercial strip on Noriega St. (30th Ave - 33rd Ave) encompasses Safeway, some Asian restaurants, grocery stores, fish and meat market. 
Utility is split with upstairs neighbor.
Washer & dryer on site.
Owner is willing to accept 1 cat with good references.
Plenty of street parking.
Income is 3X rent.
Please briefly describe yourself, your income and credit.
Please provide your cell number, email address as contact.

text:

1Br/1Ba condo on 5th floor of prestigious Art Deco style Museum Parc. This is mostly an owner-occupied building. Spacious open living, dining and kitchen floor plan. Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite counters. Large double-paned windows; curved bay in living room. Gorgeous wood floors. Over-sized bedroom with two closets, including walk-in. In-unit laundry. Lovely courtyard views - a peaceful retreat just steps from city center. Secured elevator building with 24hr concierge, elegant marble lobby and landscaped courtyard. On-site gym with heated outdoor pool. On-site Enterprise car rental, Zip Car, dry cleaners and restaurants. Leased parking in the building. Walk Score = 95. Transit Score = 100. Bike Score = 92. Downtown SF location, near Union Square's many shops and restaurants and financial district. Close to performing arts and nightlife, Westfield shopping center, MOMA, the Metreon, Moscone, Whole Foods, and public transport (Muni, Bart, Caltrain). Easy access to 101/280 and Google, Apple and Genentech shuttles.

title: $4398 / 2br - Designer Finishes in the heart of Alamo Square
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Newly Remodeled with Designer Finishes/Upgrades
For information and to schedule a viewing, contact: Tony at  show contact info
. 
Property Description
Newly renovated 2 Bedroom 1 Bath in the historical district of Alamo Square. A majestic Edwardian Building which has the distinction of being designated a Historical site. The spacious bedrooms have large windows and lots of natural light. The gourmet kitchen has been remodeled with attention to detail. It features quartz counter tops, Italian Porcelain back splash, Samsung stainless steel appliances (french door refrigerator, dishwasher, convection oven, hood and microwave) Italian Porcelain tiles, a walk up kitchen-island which accommodates seating, Large stainless steel sink, Grohe faucet and self-closing drawers. The bathroom features a glass enclosed soaking tub, Italian porcelain tiles, quartz counter top and Hans Grohe Fixtures. The living area is bright and airy with an accompanying dining area. Specially chosen modern lighting fixtures throughout. The apartment boasts hardwood floors throughout. Laundry is conveniently located within the building along with a shared patio space. On street parking. The easiest neighborhood in SF to park. Hard to believe but is truly a pleasant surprise.  
The location is within walking distance of the shops and restaurants of Hayes Valley, Nopa and Fillmore. Easy access to public transportation services by Muni bus lines including the 5, 21, 22, and 24. It has great freeway access to both 101 and 280. Google, Facebook, EA and Apple have shuttle pick ups within walking distance.   
Interior Design Features: 
- 10ft. ceilings 
- Solid Hardwood doors with stainless steel hardware 
- Hardwood floors 
- Modern lighting fixtures throughout 
- Lots of Closet and storage space 
- Expansive windows with top-down bottom up single cell shades
- Bedroom with distinctive wood molding 
- Washer and dryer in building 
- Shared Backyard 
- Gas, electricity and water separately metered  
For further information and to schedule a viewing, contact: Tony at  show contact info

title: $3100 / 1br - 500ft2 - Designer Theme: Old Hollywood meets Paris, Jacuzzi, Deck, WiFi, W/D
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
***This is a real apartment available for rent. Not a scam. We own the apartment and the whole building. Looking for nice tenants. We can meet and show you the apartment.  It has come to my attention that some scammer has been copying my ads.  Please make sure you are dealing directly with me.  I never rent to someone that I haven't met or spoken with over the phone / skype.  If you aren't in the city, then let me know if you have someone local that I can meet.  The security deposit and first month's rent is due on the first day of the lease.  Anyone asking for large sums of money up front from you is probably a scammer.  Please be aware.***
This gorgeous unit was designed by a professional interior decorator and feng shui professional. Theme was "Old Hollywood meets Tiffanys in Paris." 
***Satellite TV with 160 channels and DVR, high speed wireless internet and washer and dryer in bldg--not coin operated. 
FEATURES: 
--Spacious, beautiful, fully furnished 1 Bedroom Apartment (sleeps 4) in the Inner Sunset (near UCSF). You only need to bring your clothes and toiletries! 
--Lots of windows and light. Beautiful crystal chandeliers. Wood floors throughout. Black marble bathroom and kitchen backsplash. Lots of architectural details. Very elegant. 
--It is a classic Mediterranean style 3 unit apartment building. This unit is the top back unit. Views towards Golden Gate park. 
---Overlooks courtyard with roses and fresh landscaping. Has it's own private deck and patio furniture. 
--Street parking. Garage is rented to another tenant at this time.
--Washer and dryer located in garage. NOT coin operated. 
--Beautiful wood floors throughout apartment (except in bathroom which has beautiful black marble). 
--The entire apartment was freshly painted in Tiffany blue with shiny white trim. 
LIVING ROOM, KITCHEN & DINING ROOM: 
--Open the front door to find a big open beautiful eating, dining and living space. All wood floors, archway separating kitchen and dining area from living area. Big and beautiful crystal chandelier over dining table. Sofa pulls out into full size bed. Large flat screen TV with DVD player. 
--Use of all the furnishings and decorations that you see in the pictures come with the apartment. 
KITCHEN: 
--Big eat-in kitchen with tons of space and large pantry. 
--Glass top dining room table that seats 4. Great space for working on the computer too! Great views out the windows, especially when you are sitting at the table. 
--White cabinetry, butcher block counter top, & gas stove. Kitchen is fully equipped for cooking--all appliances, microwave, pots, pans, utensils, every type of glass, bowl, plate, etc. are included. 
MASTER BEDROOM: 
--Queen size bed. It is a Serta orthopedic mattress that is supposed to be great for the back. 
--Very pretty bedding and pillows all included. Everything matches and flows together. Very romantic. 
--Very beautiful parisian style armoir and night stand. 10 ft closet for lots of storage. Flat screen TV with DVD player so you can watch TV from your bed. All wood floors. Chrystal chandelier in bedroom. 
BATHROOM: 
--Brand new bathroom. Black marble tile on floor and shower walls. 
--6 jet jacuzzi tub. Great for showers too. 
--Brand new pedestal sink and faucets. Towels included. 
--Big window in bathroom for natural light. Bathroom old hollywood style light over mirror/sink. 
LOCATION: 
--UCSF is a few blocks away. Easy walk. It has a great fitness center/gym and swimming pool. 
--Tons of great restaurants, coffee shops, crepe places, nail salons, and cute shops within a couple of blocks. 
--Downtown Inner Sunset (9th & Judah) is only 2 blocks away. Great sushi restaurants, book stores and supermarkets in the city are only a few blocks away. 
--Several good yoga studios nearby. 
--Golden Gate Park, Museums, the arboretum, etc. are within a few blocks. 
--The N-Judah Muni stop is only a block away. It is very easy to get downtown within 25+ minutes. Or you can go the other way and be at the beach and ocean within a minutes. 
--This place scored 88 out of 100 on Walkscore because it is one of the best places to live and walk everywhere in San Francisco and even in the whole U.S. 
TERMS: 
--Extra charge for all utilities: central heating, gas, electric, water and trash. Plus, high speed wireless Internet Access, Satellite TV with 160 channels, and use of washer & dryer in garage---NOT coin operated. Washer and dryer are located in the garage with 2 big clothes lines too. 
Garage parking available for extra monthly cost.
--Deposit required. 
If interested, then please email me. Let me know what dates you need. Please make sure to include your phone number in the email.

This charming flat is located in the heart of Duboce Triangle - one of San Francisco's most desirable neighborhoods. This remodeled unit features hardwood floors, formal living room, 3 bedrooms, renovated bathroom, & modern "eat-in" kitchen with washer/dryer in-unit. This property encompasses everything one could want out of urban San Francisco living. Located just 2 blocks from Duboce Park it gives one a sense of serenity. However just several blocks away, the adjacent neighborhoods are brimming with popular shops, cafes, & fine dining, There are also boutiques, fitness centers/gyms not to mention a number of spa/salons due to its close proximity to the Castro and Lower Haight. Numerous public transportation lines and Tech Shuttles within a 3 min walk that will take you to the office or the far corners of The City. One can reach convenient Muni sub-way service to downtown, the Moscone Center and the financial district in just a short 5-6 min walk.It's all right at your fingertips.

    **Please note this is a 3 bedroom apartment with separate formal dining and living rooms. The living room may be converted to a large 4th bedroom (no closet) as it has a door. Then the dining room can be used as a small living room.** This top floor flat features hardwood floors throughout and exclusive use of a small fenced front yard. Situated above and next to a preschool, which is open Monday through Friday, 7am to 6pm. 
The spacious living room features a decorative fireplace and nice morning sunlight. The sunny kitchen features a gas range and dishwasher. Dine in the formal dining room. All three bedrooms are generously sized and the bathroom features a separate tub and shower. Shared washer/dryer off of garage. 
Located in Duboce Triangle, this home is within easy walking distance of public transportation and shopping. One block to Safeway and the Church Street Muni Station, as well as the Muni lines on Market and Duboce Streets. Whole Foods is just one more block away. Within a few minutes walk of this building, you'll find some of the city's most hip new restaurants and shops, as well as several public parks (1.5 blocks to Duboce Park, 4 blocks to Dolores Park). 
One garage space and driveway parking included (2 cars tandem). Small pets considered on a case by case basis (dogs cannot be left alone during the day due to the preschool onsite). 12 month lease (unfurnished). Square footage is approximate. Non-smoking unit.

title: $16800 / 5br - Epic Victorian in Hayes Valley
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Classic Victorian property in an ideal Hayes Valley location, just south of Alamo Square. Originally built in 1839, this property has been meticulously renovated to the highest standards and offers a seismically retrofit foundation, retained period details, high ceilings, southern facing exposure, high-end finishings, and smart home upgrades. Expansive 3000+ sq ft offers multiple options for shared or family living, corporate residency, and/or subleasing possibilities. 
The open-planned living space downstairs features lofted windows alongside double French doors that open to a private use backyard with shady, mature palm trees. Southwestern exposure ensures long sunny evenings and an ideal environment to escape the city, relax, and BBQ with friends and family. The living room is wired for both backyard and interior built-in surround sound speakers. The kitchen is beautifully laid out and is equipped to satisfy the most demanding of gourmet chefs. The entire residence has smart Nest thermostat controls.
The master bedroom upstairs overlooks the Mission district and Twin Peaks from a double set of classic Victorian windows. The master bathroom is simply majestic, including a stand-alone bathtub with views, double vanity, and waterfall shower. The massive walk-in master closet can accommodate any fashion collection.
The residence offers space for up to 4 additional bedrooms. The front bedroom is oversized, accommodates a king-size bed, and is en-suite to a parlor with faux-fireplace alongside built-in bookcases and wine storage. The bedroom downstairs accommodates a queen-size bed and is en-suite to a luxurious bathroom. A mother-in-law studio downstairs offers complete living accommodations with a full kitchen, bathroom, and separate private entrance. An additional smaller bedroom upstairs accommodates a queen-size bed and is en-suite to a private half bathroom. A total of 4 full and 2 half bathrooms ensure privacy for all.
This unique San Francisco property is being offered for immediate availability. Nearby garaged parking can be arranged. The unit is currently fully furnished and we are flexible about different tenant requirements. Please contact us for viewing availability.

title: $10000 / 2br - Fabulously Restored 2BR/2BA Flat with 3 Fireplaces, 2 Living Rooms
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Furnished, 1st Floor 2BR/2BA Flat
* $10,000/month annual lease
* short-term monthly rent negotiable
* 3-month minimum
* Garaged parking space
* 3 fireplaces
* Double living room
* Formal dining room
* Sauna
* Available: Negotiable
ADDRESS: 1828 Pacific
A Taste of Versailles in San Francisco's Pacific Heights! Fabulously Restored 2BR/2BA Flat with 3 Fireplaces, 2 Living Rooms, Dining Room, Sauna and Parking Space!
Opulent Pacific Heights furnished flat is truly fit for royalty. Both the Queen Anne Victorian and flat have been painstakingly restored. The attention to detail in restoring the flat to its original condition has to be seen to be believed. From floor to ceiling, not an inch has been overlooked.
You are greeted at the entry and throughout the flat with beautiful, leaded stained glass windows. Inlaid Brazilian cherry wood parquet glows a deep, rich red. Separated by sliding wooden doors, three large, adjoining rooms front the flat, two living rooms and the dining room. A broad corridor with cabinets and side tables connects and complements them, and each room has its own ornate, distinctly unique fireplace. Wall colors and light fixtures are unique to each of these three rooms as well. The third room farthest from the entrance, the dining room, has a magnificent 10-seat dining table, Baroque inset credenza, cabinets, and trompe l'oeil wall design.
Both bedrooms face north and receive morning and evening sun. The master bedroom has a broad bay window and extensive wall closets. The master bath has both clawfoot tub and separate glass-enclosed shower. The second bedroom includes access to a balcony, and the second bath, with shower over tub, is just outside the bedroom's entrance.
Gourmet kitchen has top-of-the-line appliances, including a high-tech nine-burner gas stove, seated counter space on the four-side marble counter top, numerous cabinets and shelves, and leaded glass sliding doors which separate it from the flat's main corridor.
The flat has a second, lower level with both sauna and steam room. Lease includes one parking space in the building's garage.
Great location within 2-3 blocks of the heart of Polk Street's shopping and dining area, Lafayette Park, and many bus lines, including the 47 and 49 Van Ness, 1 California, 19 Polk and the California Street Cable Car. 5-6 blocks and you're close to the heart of Fillmore Street's great dining and shopping district, and the start of Union Street's. Both Walk and Transit Scores are 94.
Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.

title: $5200 / 3br - 1682ft2 - Fantastic 3 bed/3 bath condo available to rent in Nob Hill 1810 Polk
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This apartment has one parking space, right beside the elevator so it is extremely convenient. It is located on the 3rd floor of a 16 unit condo building.
This apartment is costumed designed with top of the range appliances, including microwave, dishwasher, washer/dryer and granite counter-tops.
The kitchen opens out into the living room and dining room which has a fire place to create a beautiful ambiance. There is a patio off the dining area to enjoy in the hot evening.
One bedroom is downstairs which has a door leading to a the first bathroom.
Upstairs there are two really big rooms, both are en-suite, with power showers and are beautifully tiled. All three bedrooms have built-in closets with shelves made by California closet.
There are new wooden floors throughout the unit and it has been freshly painted.
This apartment is located on Polk St. which is a lively and exciting area of the city to live in. There are several shops, restaurants and cafe and bars to enjoy, socialize in and people watch. There are bus stops right outside to take you downtown in a matter of minutes.

title: $3500 / 1br - 840ft2 - Foodie Heaven! Remodeled Kitchen, Parking, One-Block from Dolores Park
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Imagine living less than one block away from world class pastries at Tartine, SF famous Italian food from Delfina, the Neapolitan-inspired pies of Delfina Pizza, and all the convenient gourmet treats of Bi-Rite.  Too good to be true?  Not at 36 Oakwood, an 8-unit apartment building tucked on a quiet one-block alley off 18th Street.  Add in a stylishly remodeled kitchen, dining area for entertaining guests and a location just one block from Dolores Park, and you are in foodie heaven!
Very spacious compared to other San Francisco one-bedroom apartments, it also has three closets (bedroom, hall walk in closet, and kitchen broom closet) to make organizing your apartment into a home easy.
Features:
  - Remodeled galley kitchen with tons of cabinet space
  - Dining area off kitchen and living room perfect for entertaining
  - Spacious living room with hardwood floors
  - Bathroom with tub/shower combo
  - Spacious bedroom with hardwood floors
  - Off-street parking for additional $150 per month
  - Additional storage available for $75 per month
  - Close to south bay commuter bus stops and easy access to 280 and 101
  - Located one block from Dolores Park and 18th Street shops and restaurants

title: $5995 / 3br - Full Flat w/ Shared Yard, Washer/ Dryer In Great Area
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
1st Floor 3BR/2BA Full Flat
* $5995/month annual lease
* Wood-burning fireplace
* Washer/dryer in shared space
* Shared yard
* Available: Now
OPEN HOUSE: tbd
ADDRESS:4615 18th Street
First floor 3BR/2BA full floor flat in Eureka Valley. Floors are carpeted except in baths and kitchen. Living room is L-shaped, has two banks of three windows. Wood-burning fireplace is at the end of the short part of the L. The top of the long end is the dining area and is in front of the kitchen. Kitchen is enclosed, includes gas stove, dishwasher and microwave. The appliances and counters take up two walls. There is room for a small dining arrangement opposite them.
The master bedroom faces the yard. It has three windows, dual sliding mirror door closets, and private bath. Bath has shower-over-tub. Second and third bedrooms both have sliding mirror door wall closets as well. Shared bath is large, has shower-over-tub.
About one third of the shared back yard is a tile patio with BBQ and some furniture. Tenants are welcome to work with parts of the yard which would benefit from landscaping or gardening. Flat has exclusive use of a washer and dryer in a laundry room with other machines.
The building is in Eureka Valley, seven blocks from Castro Street at 18th. There are a lot of shopping and dining opportunities on Castro and Van Ness Streets. Walk Score is 86, Transit Score is 88. The 33 bus is just steps away. It connects to the 24 on Castro, the 47 and 49 on Mission and goes past Dolores park. Castro MUNI and 16th Street BART are easily reached as well.
Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.

Want more information? http://unit-availability.com/lead/100007714716/floorplan/3919467/1?extnId=8248346 Residence 1 Luxury  Studio 1 bath / 326 Sq.Ft / $2,333 - $2,675  * Unit 0431 - Available Now * Unit 0919 - Available Now * Unit 0132 - Available Now Elevate to Tower 737  Are you looking for a simple, spacious apartment that includes luxury amenities? Then you need to live in one of the open studio apartments at Tower 737 in Nob Hill! You will love gazing at the view from the large bay window while sitting in your living area or at your built-in work space. The Presidio studios feature an open kitchen layout with a microwave, a stove and a dishwasher. Your Presidio studio also comes with a private bath and closet. Tower 737 is a secure building with controlled access, and includes community amenities, such as the fitness and business centers, as well as a sun deck with a grill. To complete the package, our concierge will help you with reservations, event planning, and more. Nearby you will find entertainment, galleries, and some excellent eating establishments. San Francisco is a great many things but some keywords that describe this city are: polished, celebrations, festive, nightlife, cutting-edge, fresh, beautiful, modern, iconic, chill, social, high tech, green, casual, laid-back, and world class shopping. title: $1900 / 1br - Fully furnished 1br with private bath in chic coliving space
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Hey there! We're launching a beautiful, community living space inside a boutique hotel and are looking for great people to live here with us. We have a number of rooms available for short and longer-term stays (3 month minimum)! Couples are welcome! Sadly, pets are not. 
This is really convenient for people who are new to town, don't have a lot of furniture and/or are looking for a place to call home while looking for something more permanent. 
The whole building is newly renovated, fully furnished, and professionally staffed. The rooms are located in the same building as a small hotel and the entrance to the apartment is through the hotel lobby. You'll rent a private room that has it's own private bathroom. Additionally you'll have access to a large, beautiful shared common space available exclusively to OpenDoor residents. This common space includes a gorgeous living room with huge bay windows, hardwood floors, and a fully furnished kitchen, stocked with a Vitamix blender, non-stick pans, brand new dish ware, DISHWASHER, cooking utensils and everything else you could need to cook up something great! + All utilities, cable TV, and building-wide wifi are included! 
Here's what comes with the rooms
- New Queen Size bed and frame from Tuft and Needle, complete with pillows, duvet, side table, small desk + chair
- Private bathroom with sink, tub + shower with bath mat and shower curtain
- A 4k Samsung TV with cable
- Large closet
- Building-wide security
3-month minimum stay with rent at $2100/ month (cable, wifi, and all utilities included). 
We offer rent discounts if you sign a longer-term lease with us! $2000/ month for 6 months or $1900/month for 12 months.
About Us
We're OpenDoor and we put together beautiful, community-centered, coliving homes + apartments (learn more here http://opendoor.io/portfolio/eddy-street/). We go beyond standard property management - our goal is to make living easier and more collaborative, affordable and community centered; from beautifully furnished common areas, regular cleanings, and business-class wifi; to engaging community programming, food and events.
We value diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive community which respects and embraces all individuals. We welcome people of all races, religions, color, national origins, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status to explore living here.
If this sounds like your cup of tea, please reach out to us and respond with your email address, phone number, and some times that work for you to come see our space. We'd love to show you around!

title: $3495 / 1br - 700ft2 - Fully Renovated Modern 1 bedroom apartment in quiet neighborhood
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Brand New fully renovated modern 1 bedroom apartment available for rent
Never lived in since being remodeled ground floor unit 
The Inner Mission is one of San Francisco's most vibrant neighborhoods. Homes in the neighborhood include grand, century-old houses, smaller Victorian cottages, and new condo developments that have sprung up in the past couple of years. 
Stroll along Valencia Street any evening, and you'll experience an urban planner's dream: thousands of young residents out for a bite to eat; a standing-room only crowd at the Make Out Room; tuning up their bikes at Freewheel Bike Shop; or checking out the latest avant-garde performance at Dance Mission Theater.
The neighborhood is home to dozens of restaurants serving numerous styles of cuisine, including many taquerias, for which the neighborhood has become famous. Dave Eggers' 826 Valencia foundation for kids offers writing workshops next to Paxton Gate, a store full of curiosities designed to spark anyone's imagination.
Access to public transportation is plentiful in the Mission. In addition to multiple bus lines there are two Bay Area Rapid Transit (BART) stations at 16th Street and Mission Street and 24th Street and Mission Street.
Located on a quiet neighborhood block
Apartment has the following features:
New plumbing and electrical systems
New kitchen self closings cabinets
New Stainless steel appliances
New hardwood floors throughout unit
Recessed lighting in every room
New washer and dryer in unit 
Waterfall and body spray shower 
Cable and data ready

Mood lighting in kitchen
No pets

One year lease minimum

Applicants must show proof of income and job employment
Applicants must have no evictions 
Resident is responsible for any damage to unit and move out
Renters insurance required

title: $5000 / 3br - 1000ft2 - FURNISHED 3 Bdrm 2 Ba W/D Deck/Yard All Utilitys Pets ok
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Beginning  NOVEMBER 15, 2018 This is a very large (1000+ sq ft.) 3 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment on the bottom level of a 4 unit Dutch Colonial built in 1908. Apartment is adjacent to a beautiful deck/backyard (common area). Main bedrooms are large. 1st bedroom is furnished with a king matt on top of an electric adjustable platform. Large smart tv with Dish and a beautiful, large, comfy leather recliner and matching ottoman, dresser, walk-in closet, beautiful artwork throughout. 2nd bedroom is furnished with queen matt and box on top of a beautiful platform and matching night stands and chest. Smart tv with Dish. Sliding mirrored door closet. 3rd bedroom is small, furnished with either a queen bed or a full futon, smart tv with Dish. 2nd bathroom and washer/dryer are next to this bedroom. 2nd outside access door is in this bedroom. Large kitchen with huge wood dining table comes with 6 matching chairs. Smart tv in kitchen. Rolling kitchen cart, garbage disposal, small dishwasher, microwave, toaster oven, etc. Brazilian granite counter tops. Spacious living room with wrap around sofa and large smart tv with Dish. Entire apartment has forced air heating. This property is located 1/2 block from GG Park, 4 blocks from Ocean Beach. N Judah public trans line is 1& 1/2 blocks away. Street parking only(no sticker required).
THREE MONTHS MIN ALL UTILITIES PETS OK

PROPERTY DESCRIPTION:
Make this fully furnished cottage in the trendy Mission/Castro neighborhood your next home.  The finishes have been carefully selected to create a contemporary/modern feel in a traditional San Francisco building.  The kitchen has been fully modernized with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops and glass tile backsplash.  There is a space saving fold-down Murphy bed.  The bathroom has been completely remodeled with designer fixtures and contemporary finishes.  For your convenience, there is a washer/dryer available. 
The location is in the heart of the Mission/Castro neighborhoods.  Enjoy all the dining and nightlife options that Valencia and Mission Streets have to offer. Dolores Park is only a few blocks away. With a Walkscore of 96, you will not need a car for your daily errands. Nearby car share pods include CityCar Share and GetAround. A few blocks away is the BART station and there are a number of bus and rail lines closeby.

title: $2649 Furnished studio in SF downtown
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Hello!
I am looking for someone to take over my studio lease from the mid of December (dates are flexible) till the 10th of July (and of course you can extend later). I have modern fully furnished studio on Mission Street of San - Francisco in a secure building. The studio is perfect for a single occupant or for a couple. Fully equipped kitchen includes stove, microwave, oven, toaster, blender, coffee machine, kettle, full set of cutleries and and dishes. Big bathroom with tub. Living space is separated from the "bedroom" so there will be enough privacy for 2 people. Walk - in closet with many hangers. The studio is up to 20th floor with a good inner garden view. The studio is facing south and I have lots of  natural lights (actually I never turn on light before 7.30 pm what helps a lot to save electricity). No noise neighbours around, far from elevators and laundry. The building itself is secure with 24H front desk. We also have parking, gym, laundry on every floor (really clean! we have housekeeping ladies who are cleaning it few times per day) and bike storage. Muni and bart stations are 1 minutes from the building. Few supermarkets are 10 minutes walk from, CVS, Walgreens, Starbucks close by. 
Rent is $2649 per month + utilities. 
I am ready to show the apartment for a potential tenants. 
Feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

title: $2600 / 1br - 475ft2 - Garden apartment in Duboce Triangle
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
$2600 for this well cared for one bedroom unit in the Duboce Triangle. 
Your private entrance leads to the approximately 475 sq. ft. modern style unit in our 135 year old Victorian. 
The kitchen and living room look out on the rear patio and garden area. Great space for a Bar-B-Q! 
The kitchen features a gas stove for those who love to cook and lots of cabinet space with ceramic tile counters and floor. 
The carpeted living room has large windows overlooking the garden just outside your door. 
The carpeted bedroom features an in-suite sink with a ceramic tiled vanity and a large 9' wide clothes closet.
The separate tiled bathroom has a shower-tub combination and storage cabinet over the toilet. 
There are coin operated laundry facilities in the building which are shared with the two other units upstairs. 
The Duboce Triangle is close to transportation (all Muni lines and several buses for easy access to downtown and BART). Safeway and Whole Foods are a short walk as are several specialty food stores. The nearby Castro Farmers' Market is open each Wednesday mid-March to mid-November. 
This area has so many great restaurants. You can head north to explore the Lower Haight or south to see what you can find in the Castro. Valencia Street is 5 blocks away, and Dolores Park is a block further. 
Duboce Park is just around the corner and the Duboce Park Cafe is next door!
Parking on street. Two rental bike stations are one block away. 
Sorry, no pets permitted. This cozy apartment is best suited for a single or couple. 
One year minimum. Water paid by landlord. Available Nov. 1st.
For more info, call  show contact info
. 
Open house this Saturday, Oct. 13 & Sunday, Oct. 14th from noon to about 3 pm. 
10 Sanchez Street at Duboce next door to the Duboce Park Cafe. Look for our sign near the door. 
Come by to see this great apartment. Bring copies of your full credit report and your FICO score plus employment documentation and referral information for faster processing.

text:
QR Code Link to This Post

This is a 15 minute showing so please be prompt, thank you!
SHOWING SCHEDULE ALL PROPERTIES: https://www.rentalsinsf.com/listings/showing-schedule/
Spectacular 3 Br Edwardian unit!
There are two large bedrooms, office, one full bath, beautifully refinished hardwood floors, remodeled kitchen with
brand new refrigerator, washer & dryer. Working fireplaces in living room and dining room. Kitchen also includes a gas range and dishwasher.
Large and sunny living room The living room & office is separated by a pocket door and can be opened for entertaining guests. Traditional
Italian bathroom features a separate shower and toilet rooms.
Washer and dryer in unit. Backyard deck may be used with prior permission.
Unit Features:
- 3 large bedrooms
- 1 bath
- Bright and Sunny
- Remodeled Kitchen
- Laundry in unit
Lease Terms:
- One year lease
- Security Deposit is 1.5 month's rent
- Tenant pays all utilities
- Street parking only. Monthly parking available around the corner on Washington between Leavenworth & Jones (Public Garage).
- Non-smoking unit
- Sorry, no pets
Location:
Nob Hill is a definitive San Francisco neighborhood, home to history and a pedigree that continues to thrive today.
Within the borders of this high-class neighborhood are some of the most upscale restaurants, stately homes, and exclusive hotels; yet it is surrounded by a diverse group of neighborhoods that attract a variety of residents and visitors.
The homes in Nob Hill are well known for being grand, a direct reflection of a more sophisticated time. Residents here live in mostly single-family homes that are vintage Edwardian flats, but luxury high-rise condominiums also found here make it a popular neighborhood for both young couples and urban professionals.
Its unmistakably upscale reputation goes back more than one hundred years ago during the Gold Rush when it was home to many mansions built by railroad tycoons of the time in their attempt to escape the chaos on flatter grounds. In those locations today sit luxury hotels, including the famous Fairmont Hotel, as well as Grace Cathedral, revered as one of San Francisco's grandest churches.
The iconic cable car runs up Powell into the Nob Hill neighborhood taking tourists through the vibrant area. While similar in stature to neighbors like Russian Hill and Pacific Heights, the heights of Nob Hill seem to represent a climb up to the life of luxury, while surrounding districts such as the Financial District, Downtown, North Beach, and nearby Tenderloin each possess a completely unique and distinct character separate from Nob Hill.
Home to some of the most distinguished buildings and people of San Francisco, Nob Hill is a beloved neighborhood.
Please contact Liz Pisco
Leasing Agent - License # 01515257 
Broker - Jackie Tom / Rentals In SF 1318 Hayes Street San Francisco CA 94117.
Rental listings subject to change at any time. (Agent for Owner) believes all information contained herein to be correct but assumes no legal responsibility for the accuracy, any errors, or any omissions

	This gorgeous three bedroom two bathroom top floor two level flat is located on Collingwood and 19th Street nestled away in one of San Francisco's most sought after neighborhoods in Eureka Valley. One block  away lies the Castro which is home to some of San Francisco's best restaurants, cafes and vibrant nigh-life as well as being a stones throw away from Dolores Park, Whole Foods and Safeway supermarkets.
	This home is one of the finest Queen Ann Victorians in San Francisco and has been maintained to the highest standard and hosts stunning downtown San Francisco views, while keeping its charm with grand ceilings, marble fireplace, stately leaded glass windows, lemon trees, tranquil garden with gazebo and brick patio.

	 

	Unit Features

	~ Top two floors of a three unit building
	~ Large living room with marble fireplace
	~ Chef's kitchen with 6 burner Viking Stove and stainless steel appliances throughout
	~ Full size washer and dryer in unit
	~ Three large bedrooms with high ceilings and stunning downtown views
	~ Two full bathroom with upstairs bathroom offering panoramic city views 
	~ Private deck and common yard with lemon tree
	~ 1 parking space included
	This unit comes furnished, please call Shane @ show contact info
 to schedule a private showing and more information
This is a non-smoking unit. Service or support animals which are necessary due to disability will be allowed.

title: $3595 / 2br - Gorgeous TOP floor TWO bedroom REMODELED apt near Duboce Park
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
OPEN HOUSE
1ST showing: Thur, 10/11 from 5:30PM - 6:00PM
2nd showing: Saturday, 10/13 from 3:30PM - 4:00PM
3rd showing, Sunday, 10/14 from 2:30PM to 3:00PM
Upon arrival, please use the intercom and call apt 4 and I will buzz you in.  Apt #4 is located on the top floor.  If you are unable to make it to the showings noted above, please email me and we can schedule another day/time for showing.
ABOUT THE UNIT
~ TOP floor TWO bedroom, one bath apartment
~ Unit was completely remodeled a few years ago
~ Gorgeous kitchen with granite countertop, maple wood cabinets, garbage disposal, stainless steel appliances
~ Spacious living room with open kitchen
~ Both bedrooms have large windows and large closets
~ One hall closet and one linen closet
~ Unit gets a ton of natural sunlight. Every room gets natural sunlight, even bathroom (sky light)
~ Hardwood floors throughout the unit (except kitchen and bathroom has tiled flooring)
~ Entire unit has been newly painted 
*NOTE: pictures were taken prior to entire unit being re-painted and cleaned**
ABOUT THE BUILDING / AREA
~ Six unit, three story building (no elevators)
~ Laundry facilities in the building
~ This building is located at 24 Belcher (Duboce Triangle / Castro)
~ 24 Belcher Street is 1.5 blocks (two minute walk) to Church Street metro station
~ Duboce Park is one block away
~ Both Safeway and Whole Foods are just a block away
~ Walking distance to Castro, Haight Street, and Dolores Park
~ Transit score 100
~ Walk score 98
~ Bike score 93
LEASE TERMS
~ Require one year lease commitment

title: $3800 / 1br - Gorgeous, top, third floor 1BR/1BA in the Marina
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
* $3,800/month annual lease
* Laundry in building
* Shared roof deck
* Jacuzzi
* Small pet considered
* Yard good for BBQ
* Parking available for Add'l Fee
* Available: November 10th
ADDRESS: 2465 Chestnut Street #304
OPEN HOUSE: tbd
Gorgeous, top, third floor 1BR/1BA in the Marina. Classic San Francisco apartment has a hacienda-style feel. Floors are hardwood parquet in living room and dining room and hardwood elsewhere except in tile bath. Living room and kitchen have built-in shelving. Large, deep living room has a bank of three windows at one end and wall sconces. The living room a very large closet and there is a door to the dining room at the windowed end. Dining room is in front of windows and open to the kitchen. It can accommodate a six-setting dining arrangement. Kitchen is galley-style and includes electric stove, microwave and dishwasher. It has a lot of cabinets, many with glass panes, and lots of counter space.
Bedroom is large and has a sizeable closet. It has a view of Angel Island. Bath has both a jacuzzi and a glass shower stall. Building has shared laundry and a roof deck. Roof deck has a spectacular 360° view which includes the Golden Gate Bridge, Alcatraz, and the downtown skyline. Deck has some chairs and two tables. Parking is available in the building for an additional fee. Landlord will consider pets.
Terrific location at the Presidio end of Chestnut Street's vibrant shopping and dining district. Walk Score is 96. It's just steps to the bus line 30. Lines 22, 28, 41, 43, and 45 are within reasonable walking distance.
Please be noted, that pictures are of a similar unit with same layout.
Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.
Everest Mwamba
Kenney & Everest Real Estate

text:

One Bedroom with walk-in closet. Spacious formal dining room/den or office. Remodeled bathroom, cultured marble finish around tub/shower combination with sliding glass doors. Long entry hallway with linen closet. Refinished hardwood floors throughout. Window coverings wooden faux blinds and wooden shades in the kitchen. No pets, waterbeds, No Airbnb, and non smoking building. Requires a one year lease and security deposit at time of rental. Coin operated laundry room facility in the building.

title: $4495 / 2br - Great Condo across from Fort Mason 1111 Bay Street #205
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
2nd Floor 2BR/2BA Condominium
* $4,495/month annual lease
* Garaged parking space available for Add'l Fee
* Washer/dryer
* Fireplace
* Shared roof deck
* Shared courtyard
* Spectacular city views
* Available: November 1st
ADDRESS:1111 Bay Street #205
OPEN HOUSE: tbd
Modern 2BR/2BA condominium across from Fort Mason. Floors are hardwood except in carpeted bedrooms and tile baths. Combined living and dining room is large with a view of Fort Mason. Living room has a dual gas/wood-burning fireplace. Kitchen has an open, marble counter facing the dining space with bar-style seating. Kitchen includes stainless dishwasher, microwave, electric stove and has a garbage disposal.
Master bedroom has shower-over-tub private bath with sliding glass doors. Both bedrooms have the Fort Mason view and mirrored sliding door wall closets. Main bath is also shower-over-tub with sliding glass doors. Stacked washer/dryer are in a hall closet.
Building is very secure. Roof deck has a nearly 360° view with just a small area to the south behind a rooftop structure. View includes Presidio, Golden Gate Bridge, North Bay, Alcatraz, Russian Hill, parts of downtown and Nob Hill. Parking space in the building's garage available for Add'l Fee. Secure, private storage comes with parking. Long courtyard alongside building could be used for a variety of purposes. It's nine blocks to the start of Chestnut Street's shopping and dining district, about the same to shopping and dining on Union Street. Transit Score is 90. Bus lines 30, 47, 49, 76 and Silicon Valley shuttles on Van Ness are within easy walking distance.

title: $7395 / 4br - 2000ft2 - Great Location!Stunning 4BR2BA home! By cable car, Muni, BART station!
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
 $7,395.00 per month for unfurnished rental 
 $7,95.00 per month for furnished rental 
 1 year lease term 
Spacious 4-bedrooms and 2 bathrooms home conveniently located near Financial District, Chinatown, Union Square, and public transportation. 

 Kitchen Amenities 
 Refrigerator 
 Microwave 
 Stove 
 Washer &Dryer 

-Walking distance to Financial District, Union Square and Chinatown 
-Accessible to public transportation such as Cable Car, Muni, and BART
 Located in Russian Hill-Great Location!
 One of the original seven hills of San Francisco, Russian Hill is rated 96 out of 100 on a walk ability scale. This charming area channels a San Francisco from the past--sidewalks are replaced by hidden stairways and residents ride the city's iconic cable cars. Cozy cafes and local-favorite watering holes round out this reserved neighborhood's cordial repertoire. This is the best neighborhood with a myriad of coffee shops, restaurants, pubs and meeting places. 

 It is moments away from San Francisco landmarks: Union Square, The Financial District, The Ferry Building, North Beach, China Town and much more. The neighborhood has everything you need from North beach restaurants to a 12 min walk to Safeway,Trader Joe's, 24 HR fitness and 2 Blocks from 30 bus that runs right into the financial district. 


 Centrally located, the home is situated 4 blocks from Cable Car Museum and 6 blocks away from Grace Cathedral and Mark Hopkins.  With Powell Street BART station only a short walk through Lower Nob Hill and Union Square and several MUNI connections, all of San Francisco is at your fingertips. Or take the cable car to all the exciting places: Fisherman's Wharf, Ghiradelli Square and Downtown.

title: $4950 / 3br - Hardwood Floors | Top Floor Full Floor Flat | 2 Decorative Fireplaces
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Spacious Top Floor unit with 2 Decorative fireplaces
Address: 534 5th Avenue 
Neighborhood: Inner Richmond
Bedrooms: 3
Bathrooms: Split bath
Style: Apartment 
Sqft: 1,300 approx. 
Parking: Street
Security Deposit: One month
Lease Term: 12
Asking Rent: $4,950
This light filled top floor flat has lots of period details and hardwood floors throughout. As you come up the stairs, there is a nice sized landing for a beautiful formal entrance. The eat-in kitchen has tile flooring and granite counters with stainless steel appliances including a 5-burner gas range. The kitchen opens to the living room which has coffered ceilings, decorative fireplace, original built-in cabinets and Eastern exposure to the rear of the building. The split bathroom has been recently updated with tile surround shower over the tub and newer vanity. The building has shared laundry with one other tenant. Sorry, no pets.
Features: 
• Full Floor Flat
• Hardwood Floors 
• Eat-in Kitchen 
• 5-burner gas range
• Stainless steel appliances
• Updated Bathroom
• Split Bath 
• 2 decorative fireplaces
• Laundry 
• Tenants must hold renters insurance
• Owners pay: Water and Garbage
This property is conveniently located a couple blocks Arguello Market, Safeway and around the corner from well known Cinderella Bakery, walking distance to USF and Golden Gate Park.

title: $2600 / 550ft2 - Huge Studio in Pac Heights - Pet Friendly -Available December 5
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
We are leaving our spacious pac heights studio of 4 years to a new home in SOMA. This is a perfect space for 1-2 people with 1-2 pets (1 dog/ 2 cats or 1 dog 1 cat).  This studio features an open floor plan with carpet throughout, tons of natural light and a warm fireplace. You are truly in the middle of San Francisco with union street 3 blocks away, marina about 7 blocks and polk 2 blocks. Lots to do every weekend! Lafayette and Fort Mason also steps from your doorstep. Also some of the old furniture can stay if interested (couch, stools, tv wall mount, small table, display cabinet). 
Apartment Details:
- Studio/1 bath: $2,600, 550 sq. ft. 
- Security deposit: 1 Months' Rent / last months rent also required.
- Pet friendly: $600 deposit required, some breed and weight restrictions apply
- Parking: 35% off for new residents. Rent a space for $200/month. 
- Building pays for gas (gas fireplace in unit!), water, and trash
- Residents are responsible for electricity and cable/internet
- Gym, sauna and spa on site for residents use. Mon -Sat 5:30 am - 10:00 pm and Sun 7:30 am - 10:00 pm
- The unit one floor above ground level but does not require elevator use.
- Unit faces building with some views of franklin street.
- Laundry room on site, card operated machines ($2 each load wash/dry)
- RENT CONTROLLED** building 
- Convenient location near transportation (47,49,12,27) restaurants, coffee, stores, and parks
- Walk to fidi in 35 mins 
- Dog park located 5 minute walk away (this is where we take our dog every morning/afternoon)
-Union street mountain view bus stop 2 blocks away 
-On site management (great attitude, very helpful maintenance)
-Night/after hours management available (lost keys, security issue etc)
-Non competitive, first to apply and get accepted by the building will move in
-1 year lease term required 
-Apartment website: http://www.grosvenoratriumliving.com/
-Available December 5th 2018.
Serious inquiries only. Tours available weekends starting October 27, please contact with a small blurb about yourself if interested.

text:

ID#842: Marina Renovated 3BR/2.5BA 2-Level Unit w/Views, Deck, 2-Car Garage
Private entry leads to this beautifully renovated unit on the top 2 floors of a 2-unit building in the Marina. Large living room w/fireplace and spacious dining room both w/built-in shelving and cabinetry. Well-designed eat-in kitchen w/high-end stainless steel appliances, granite counters and custom cabinetry. 2 bedrooms share a mosaic bathroom w/shower and separate powder room. Upstairs is the master suite w/walk-in closet and ensuite bathroom w/dual shower, double sinks and lovely tiled stonework. French doors open to a great deck w/gas grill outlet and straight-on views of the Palace of Fine Arts plus a peek-a-boo view of the Golden Gate Bridge. Amenities: laundry room, music system, video/audio entrance intercom, 3-heating zones, 2-car garage. Near Chestnut Street, Marina Green, Crissy Field and The Presidio.

title: $1800 In-law studio apartment with privet entrance
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Bright and cozy in-law studio apartment (perfect for one person only) with privet entrance , located in quiet neighborhood near Ocean Beach and Golden Gate Park, available for rent immediately. Direct access to backyard. Walking distance to public transportation, shops, and restaurants.  Minutes to Hwy 280, 101 and 1. 
It has a full bathroom with a bath tub and shower,walk -in closet, kitchen with a refrigerator and microwave but no stove (portable stoves and convection ovens are allowed).
The apartment is on a very quite Richmond District Street, and has plenty of street parking. 
With the unit price, we are including all utilities: water, PG&E, garbage, WiFi Internet, Dish Network Satellite TV. 
Pets are negotiable.
Available: now
Lease Term : One year (minimum 12 months lease)                                                                          
Monthly rent  : $1,800
Security deposit : $1,000                                                                                                 
Last month rent $1,800 
Total Move-in Cost : 4,600.00
Parking   : Street parking only                 
Laundry  : not included  (Coin-operated laundry is two blocks away)
Its literally steps away from the Golden Gate Park entrance to Spreckels Lake, and the biggest dog park in Golden Gate Park.The Fulton #5 bus line (Ocean beach to Downtown) stops a block away. The Sunset 29 bus line on 25th Ave. (to Marina or Stonestown / SFSU). For drivers it's the perfect location near Sunset Blvd, 19th Avenue, The Great Highway and Golden Gate Bridge.
Two blocks away you have one of best SF local dining. CVS Market, and Fresh and Easy 4 blocks away. Safeway is very close on Laplaya St.
Show daily. To schedule viewing, street address and other information, please email Antonina. Briefly describe your party to see a match (a little bit about yourself, move in date, number of people planning to live in the apartment,student or employee, etc.)  
Please be prepared to submit credit report and last two-month paystub when submitting application.
Thank you for your interest!

title: $4200 / 1br - 1100ft2 - Join the Hottest Neighborhood in SF
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
... or maybe the coolest neighborhood in San Francisco.
 Called "the best kept secret in San Francisco," this unique loft space is in San Francisco's most dynamic neighborhood. Located in an immaculately maintained, intimate boutique building directly across the street from the iconic AT&T Ballpark and one block from the Embarcadero waterfront, this space is designed perfectly for home/office use.
 The open space floor plan allows maximum flexibility for living and working, including space for home office. The kitchen boasts high-end appliances along with a moveable island to create the perfect cooking and eating space. The apartment has a large private patio and the building has a roof top deck with spectacular Bay and Ballpark views for additional lounging and entertaining space.
 Hardwood floors and high end custom finishes create sleek and upscale environment.
 The location can't be beat. . .the building is perfectly situated one block from the CalTrain station providing comfortable access to the Peninsula and Silicon Valley. Direct access to Hwys 280, 101 and 80 make the entire Bay Area conveniently reachable. Muni lines run in the immediate area, and the ferries and BART are both nearby.
 A pleasant walk takes you to Mission Bay, Moscone Convention Center, the Ferry Building, the Financial District and Union Square as well as many of the city's major tech companies.
 A gourmet Safeway is a block away, Whole Foods is nearby and the neighborhood is replete with great restaurants, entertainment, galleries and beautiful parks.
 Features Include:
 * Built in closets 
 * 2 full bathrooms
 * Hardwood floors
 * Gourmet kitchen featuring Italian design custom cabinets, Caesar stone countertops, Italian porcelain and glass tile, Viking gas range, Bosch dishwasher, refrigerator/freezer
 * Multi-use island
 * Custom high end finishes throughout
 * Washer/dryer in unit
 * Secure building with on-site security
 * Daily valet laundry service available
 * Building is wired for Webpass
Additional:
* One enclosed parking space with additional storage locker available for $250 per month 
This space is available August 30th, 2018.
 Rent is $4,200.00 Deposit is $4,200. Rent includes water, gas and garbage.
 Lease term is one year minimum.
 To view by appointment only contact Ciara at  show contact info

title: $2995 Jr 1 Bd w/ Luxurious Kitchen + Bath in Historic Building, MUST SEE!
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Elegantly Updated Jr. 1 Bdrm in a Storied San Francisco Setting (Lower Nob Hill)  $2995
Within the breathtaking facade of 952 Sutter Street are renovated luxury apartments that combine elegant period details with posh modern amenities. This remarkable residential building is listed on the National Register of Historic Places. 
This Jr. 1 bedroom apartment is comfortable and sumptuous- featuring a freshly renovated chef's kitchen and an exquisitely restored bath featuring state-of-the-art fixtures and appliances, gorgeous marble counters and crisp modern cabinetry. Each unit offers charmingly unique vintage details throughout, including gorgeous hardwood floors, wainscoted walls, original doors with brass hardware, tall double-hung windows, crown moldings and coffered ceilings.   
Features: 
Sleek Chef's kitchen with dishwasher, built-in microwave and floor-to-ceiling cabinets
Upgraded Lighting Fixtures 
In-Unit Washer/Dryer
Spacious Closets
Shared Yard/Patio  
Marble Cabinets  
Renovated Bathroom with Tiled Shower Over Bath
About the Neighborhood: 
Nestled between Nob Hill, Union Square, and the Tenderloin, Lower Nob Hill evokes both the elegance of Nob Hill and the hipness of the Tenderloin, and it is dotted with edgy art galleries and bohemian coffee shops. For foodies, hip eateries and casual cocktail lounges can be found on every block.  Gourmet groceries can be found a block away at Sutter Fine Foods, and Heart of the City Farmers Market is a twice weekly event, located nearby. Minutes from Union Square and the Financial District, Lower Nob Hill is a commuters dream, from the iconic California Street Cable Car, to cross town Muni buses, and Civic Center BART and Metro station.
Walking Score: 99
Biking Score: 75
Transit Score: 1000

title: $3095 / 1br - Junior 1 bedroom/1bathroom with gorgeous bay window! Rent Controlled!
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
br>Comfort and Enjoyment  Located near the northeast corner of San Francisco, Nob Hill has some of the most beautiful architecture in the city. The neighborhood was built on one of the city's 44 hills, affording its residents breathtaking views of the San Francisco Bay and Marin County, as well as Alcatraz and the Marina District. Nob Hill can be found due north of the Union Square shopping district and Market Street, and also borders on Chinatown and the Financial District. Originally called California Hill, after the street that climbs up the hill's eastern face, it was renamed Nob Hill after the Central Pacific Railroad's "Big Four," Leland Stratford, Collis Peter Huntington, Mark Hopkins and Charles Crocker, called The Nobs, built mansions there. This area still retains many of these qualities, from beautiful parks to perfectly preserved homes and churches. Today, a wealthy urban professional population rubs shoulders with some of the city's oldest families here.  Call Now:  show contact info

Originally called California Hill, after the street that climbs up the hill's eastern face, it was renamed Nob Hill after the Central Pacific Railroad's "Big Four," Leland Stratford, Collis Peter Huntington, Mark Hopkins and Charles Crocker, called The Nobs, built mansions there. This area still retains many of these qualities, from beautiful parks to perfectly preserved homes and churches. Today, a wealthy urban professional population rubs shoulders with some of the city's oldest families here.  Call Now:  show contact info

title: $2400 / 600ft2 - Large Modernized Studio in Beautiful Neighborhood
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Please Note: Images above may not be of the available unit but of a similar unit.FOR RENT: 1 Large Studio, Smoke-Free in a Beautiful Neighborhood close to the Ocean with Views!AVAILABLE: Now
EL PRADO APARTMENTS 101 Point Lobos Avenue, San Francisco CA 94121
UNIT VIEWING: Unit Viewing is this Sunday 12:00 PM to 2:00 PMIndividual viewing appointments may be made at mutually convenient dates and times.  Please note that same day appointments are unlikely.

INFORMATION:
Rent: $2400 per month

Property type: Apartment

Available: Early July

Bedrooms: Studio

Bathrooms: 1

Approximate Square Feet: 600

Ocean Views: Yes!

Pets allowed: Cats Only

Pet restrictions: Pet deposits range from $300.00 to $500.00

Included utilities: Heat, Hot & Cold Water, Garbage

Rent control: Yes

Lease: Annual
RENTAL FEATURESSMOKE-FREE UNITS
Hardwood Floors Throughout
Period Features
New Kitchen, Custom Cabinetry and Granite Counters
High End Appliance Upgrades
Multi Custom-Cycle Dishwasher
Self-Cleaning Gas Range
Microwave
Undercounter Stainless Steel Sink and; Dual Spray Retractable Faucet
Large Walk In Closet
BUILDING AMENITIESSpanish Revival Architecture
Secure Entry System
On Site Laundry
Basement Garage
Elevator
Large Period Lobby
Landscaped Grounds

Beautifully remodeled large studio in a 1920's Spanish Revival Building in the Vista del Mar/Sutro Height Neighbor of the Outer Richmond has Spectacular Spanning Ocean Views.  On a clear day, you can see all the way down the coast line to Pedro Point, south of Pacifica.  This corner unit has a large kitchen with dishwasher, 5 burner range, microwave/hood/light, under-counter sink and under-cabinet lighting.  Must see it to really appreciate it.Built in 1925, El Prado is a Spanish revival beauty that boasts some of the most spectacular ocean views in the Lincoln Park area. The restored lobby entrance leads you to spacious units flooded with natural light from large floor to ceiling windows. Private entry room, large walk in closets, newly remodeled kitchens with separate dining area. This spacious studio features classic retro elegance, period fixtures and details with all the modern conveniences. And El Prado is a few blocks from so many things to do, especially if you like outdoors and the ocean. Trails to hike and bike just are just a short walk down to Lands End and Lincoln Parks. Play a few rounds at the Lincoln Park golf course, see the latest exhibit at the Legion of Honor. Of course, you can always take off your shoes down at the beach to walk along the shore and perhaps fly a kite. For your convenience, we provide an on-site laundry. We also feature indoor parking for an additional monthly rent, but we only have a limited number and they are currently occupied.

title: $3695 / 1br - Large one bedroom with washer and dryer inside! Rent Controlled!
text:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Comfort and Enjoyment  Located near the northeast corner of San Francisco, Nob Hill has some of the most beautiful architecture in the city. The neighborhood was built on one of the city's 44 hills, affording its residents breathtaking views of the San Francisco Bay and Marin County, as well as Alcatraz and the Marina District. Nob Hill can be found due north of the Union Square shopping district and Market Street, and also borders on Chinatown and the Financial District. Originally called California Hill, after the street that climbs up the hill's eastern face, it was renamed Nob Hill after the Central Pacific Railroad's "Big Four," Leland Stratford, Collis Peter Huntington, Mark Hopkins and Charles Crocker, called The Nobs, built mansions there. This area still retains many of these qualities, from beautiful parks to perfectly preserved homes and churches. Today, a wealthy urban professional population rubs shoulders with some of the city's oldest families here.  Call Now:  show contact info
